original_title: Almost Real: Connecting in a Wired World
overview: This documentary presents a few individuals for whom the Internet has become a way to connect with like-minded souls in surprising ways: a cyber punk based on an anti-aircraft rig in the English Channel who operates a rogue Web server, a monk developing "wireless prayer technology," a "gamer" who re-creates himself in an online game, a retired couple living in an Internet-controlled seniors' complex and a divorc√©e who exchanges vows online with a man she's never met.
title: Almost Real: Connecting in a Wired World
